content.en: Healthcare optimization: Researchers have been using algorithms to address various challenges in healthcare settings, such as optimizing work shifts in emergency departments, reducing waiting times, and managing ambulance redeployment strategies. These algorithms, including linear optimization models, heuristic search algorithms, and machine learning, simulation, and optimization techniques, are being used to improve patient care and operational performance. By leveraging data and computational methods, these algorithms help healthcare professionals make more informed decisions and transform emergency department workflows.
content.da: Sundhedsoptimering: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at tackle forskellige udfordringer i sundhedssektoren, såsom at optimere arbejdsplaner i skadestuer, reducere ventetider og håndtere strategier for omlægning af ambulancer. Disse algoritmer, inklusive lineære optimeringsmodeller, heuristiske søgealgoritmer samt maskinlæring, simulering og optimeringsteknikker, anvendes til at forbedre patientpleje og operationel ydeevne. Ved at udnytte data og beregningsmetoder hjælper disse algoritmer sundhedsprofessionelle med at træffe mere informerede beslutninger og omdanne arbejdsgange i skadestuer.
